title: unakku samAnamAi
sahitya:
unakku samAnamAi oruvarai shollavO oppuyarvillA appanE paramporuLE


anupallavi

  enakku samAnamA enru mAr taTTiya eNNAyiram kOTi pEr maNNAgak-kaNDuviTTOm


caraNam    nIyanri ulaguNDO nIrinri mInuNDO nIla vAn shuDarinri nILuyirk-kulamuNDO
tAyum tandaiyumAga dayavuDan eppOdun-tAngi engaLai viTTu nIngAda kaDavuLE
